TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 47, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 24, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 42}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a prismarine_brick_slab, I need to place 3 prismarine_bricks in a row on the crafting table. Since I have 3 prismarine_bricks in my inventory, I will first move one to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: After moving the first prismarine_bricks, I now need to move the second one to the right of it. Therefore, I will move the second prismarine_bricks to slot 2.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1
